name: DJ Pdex - Colours In Sound Vol.1 EP CD BUNDLE
description:
DJ Pdex debut EP, Colours in Sound is here! This limited edition CD bundle contains:

-Colours In Sound Vol.1 CD 
-Colours In Sound Poster 
-DJ Pdex stickers
-Limited edition Colours In Sound 'Pdex Spex' Glasses.
-A few bits from the featured artists

==Tracklist==

Pdex & Lights Go Blue - Kiss This (Re-Remix)
Pdex & Eliza Shaddad - All of You (Dubstep Remix)
Pdex & Melodi Hadebe - Any Style
Pdex & Polly Poison - Re-Arranged (Remix)

Look out for the Colours in Sound mixtape, available 01/03/10!

=====
Free postage and packaging for UK/ROI shipping.

Orders will be dispatched no earlier than 31/3/2010.

Any questions/problems/comments please email
matt@inthefaderecords.com

Special thanks to The Fotograffer for the great artwork. http://www.thefotograffer.com
